game.name: Nauts
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Nauts is a space action roguelike. Run and develop your civilization in a mysterious and dangerous universe. Knowledge will be your best tool: explore and discover what is hidden in to the Cosmos while surviving as many dangers that will appear on your journey.
